title: New: Astronauts, etc. – Mystery Colours
content:
So the chillwave bandwagon may well have lost a couple of wheels along the way, yet that hasn’t stopped numerous musicians extracting the parts of the sound worth saving, and manipulating it into their own brand of electronic pop.

Anthony Ferraro, aka Astronauts, etc. from Berkeley, CA has done just that, with debut single Mystery Colours showcasing his own strain of “supermelodic pulp”. Silky synths and simple yet effective lyrics (“your history, is coming back to educate me, to put me out of place and take me, to another time“) make up the majority of what is a mightily impressive first outing.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
